# Pride (Domain)

**Granted Powers:** Whenever you roll a 1 on a saving throw, you can immediately reroll the save. You must keep the result of the second roll, even if it is another 1.

**Pride Domain Spells**

**1 [[Hypnotism (Spell)|Hypnotism]]:** Fascinates 2d4 HD of creatures.

**2 [[Eagle's Splendor (Spell)|Eagleâ€™s Splendor]]:** Subject gains +4 Cha for 1 minute/level.

**3 [[Heroism (Spell)|Heroism]]:** Gives +2 bonus on attack rolls, saves, skill checks.

**4 [[Divine Power (Spell)|Divine Power]]:** You gain attack bonus, +6 to Str, and 1 hp/level.

**5 [[Reduce Person, Mass (Spell)|Reduce Person, Mass]]:** Reduces several creatures.

**6 [[Forbiddance (Spell)|Forbiddance]] <sup>M</sup>:** Blocks planar travel, damages creatures of different alignment.

**7 [[Heroism, Greater (Spell)|Heroism, Greater]]:** Gives +4 bonus on attack rolls, saves, skill checks; immunity to fear; temporary hp.

**8 [[Spell Immunity, Greater (Spell)|Spell Immunity, Greater]]:** As *[[Spell Immunity (Spell)|spell immunity]],* but up to 8th-level spells.

**9 [[Charm Monster, Mass (Spell)|Charm Monster, Mass]]:** As *[[Charm Monster (Spell)|charm monster]],* but all within 30 ft.
